about_the_game:
Dragon Essence - Color My World - Original Soundtrack

Note: The files can be found by right-clicking Dragon Essence - Color My World - > Properties > Local Files > Browse Local Files

FEATURES

  • Dragon Essence
  • As the Sun Sets
  • That Radiant Sky
  • My Precious Shelter
  • Embraced by the Darkness
  • False Reality
  • The Essence of the Forest
  • Those Magnificent Beings
  • To the Distant Land
  • Eternal Happiness (Unused Track)
  • In Your Memory (Unused Track)
  • Reincarnated Fate (Unused Track)
  • Color My World
  • Color My World Full
  • Color My World Full (No Vocal)
  • Color My World Remix
  • Color My World Full Remix
  • Color My World Full Remix (No Vocal)
  • 18 Pages Music Booklet

CREDITS

  • Composer: Garoad, Clea Leshlick & Dibur
  • Vocal: Yanovi
  • Lyrics: Mirage
